cluster_information.name: User Label
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides a feature to tag an endpoint with zero or more labels.

struct_fields.name: Label
struct_fields.description: The Label or Value semantic is not defined here. Label examples: 'room', 'zone', 'group', 'direction'.

struct_fields.name: Value
struct_fields.description: The Value is a discriminator for a Label that may have multiple instances. Label:Value examples: 'room':'bedroom 2', 'orientation':'North', 'floor':'2', 'direction':'up'

attributes.name: LabelList
attributes.description: This is a list of string tuples. An implementation SHALL support at least 4 list entries per node for all User Label cluster instances on the node.
